Literature.Title: Effects of single D-amino acid substitutions on disruption of beta-sheet structure and hydrophobicity in cyclic 14-residue antimicrobial peptide analogs related to gramicidin S.
Literature.Author: Lee DL, Powers JP, Pflegerl K, Vasil ML, Hancock RE, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=>90µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>90µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=45µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C610(MIC=>90µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=45µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=11µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=45µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=90µg/ml)
